entry.def: Dripping is the fat which comes out of meat when it is fried or roasted, and which can be used for frying food.
If you are dripping wet, you are so wet that water is dripping from you.

example.ex: We were dripping wet from the spray.

means.word_mean: 1. a liquid (as water) that flows in drops (as from the eaves of house)
2. the sound of a liquid falling drop by drop;

sentences.sentence: "the constant sound of dripping irritated him"
"the scene where he is singing in the rain in dripping clothes"
"there was little shelter under the dripping trees"

means.word_mean: 2. wet with secreted or exuded moisture such as sweat or blood or tears;
